name: InitializePaymentType
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

F.name: DateTimeValue
F.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

F.name: NumberValue
F.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

F.name: StringValue
F.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

T.name: ArticleVatcategory
T.description:
Possible values:

* `1` - HighRate
* `2` - LowRate
* `3` - ZeroRate
* `4` - NullRate
* `5` - MiddleRate

S.name: CustomerGender
S.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Unknown
* `1` - Male
* `2` - Female
* `9` - NotApplicable

U.name: UserCardID
U.description: This is the ID of a `UserCard`

BA.name: DisplayOnTerminal
BA.description: If the current station terminal should be instructed to show this QR code, too.

BA.name: ReturnUrl
BA.description: ReturnUrl where the customer should be redirected to after the payment.

BA.name: SendEmail
BA.description: If an email with payment information should be sent.

BA.name: SendEmailTo
BA.description: When `SendEmail` is true, but `SendEmailTo` is omitted, a fallback to the Order.Customer.EmailAddress is attempted.

BC.name: StationID
BC.description: This is the ID of a `Station`

B.name: PaymentTypeID
B.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentType`

BN.name: Code
BN.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

BN.name: Message
BN.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

BN.name: RequestID
BN.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

BN.name: Type
BN.description: A short description of the error type.

BO.name: ExternalIDs
BO.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

BO.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
BO.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

BO.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
BO.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

BT.name: OrderID
BT.description: This is the ID of a `Order`
